Title: American germ warfare criminals will not escape the righteous punishment of the people of the world!
Designer: Ma Changli (马常利)Wang Naizhuang (王乃壮)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: The Chinese worker holds a document entitled "American Germ Warfare - Crime investigation report" (美國細菌戰 - 罪行調查報告), published by the International Association of Democratic Lawyers (國際民主法律工作者協會).The caricatures below right are Dean Acheson (US Secretary of State), Harry Truman (US president) and a wounded US soldier. They are trying to hide bottles labelled 鼠疫 - plague.
Theme: Patriotic Health Campaign (1952)Foreign Friends: North KoreaForeign imperialists
